data.instruction: Simulate this persona scenario and validate outcome deterministically: "Multiple waitlist priority (first-come)". Capture traces and snapshots so coverage can be audited later.
data.expectedResult: Scenario behavior is either confirmed as supported or produces a clear, actionable failure report.

data.instruction: Using concrete API reads and persisted state checks, validate this requirement is satisfied: "Class credit pricing (lower than direct, but volume)". If not satisfied, record exact gap and failing entities/endpoints.
data.expectedResult: Evidence either confirms requirement coverage or captures a precise, reproducible gap.

data.instruction: Create an offer representing the UC primary service; choose execution mode matching the scenario.
data.expectedResult: Offer is created in draft state with captured id.
